page_content: The page provides tax-related information and requires Adobe Reader to view certain documents.
The page discusses energy efficiency requirements for new and existing buildings.
The page discusses an art exhibition featuring works from the Werner Coninx Foundation.
The page describes the services offered by the Amt für Informatik, including planning and coordinating IT security measures and developing software for internal use.
The page provides a testimonial about TRUMPF Schweiz AG, a high-tech company that develops innovative solutions in production technology, including software solutions for Smart Factories.
The page provides information on herd protection measures, including the use of fences and herd protection dogs.
The page is about an art exhibition focusing on the early years and artistic development of Alberto Giacometti.
The page provides guidelines and forms for income and wealth tax declarations, including a link to download the SofTax GR NP software for tax filing.
The page discusses a program aimed at balancing academic and athletic commitments for students involved in competitive sports.
The page describes the Cybercrime Services team of the Cantonal Police of Graubünden, which specializes in IT forensics, cybercrime investigations, and criminal analysis.
